Detailed Description

The "../src/webpages" folder contains example web pages that can be loaded onto the the Modtronix Web Server.

The compiled web pages are in the *.img files in this folder. These files can be uploaded to the Modtronix Web Server via Modtronix Network Bootloader, FTP or serial port (Xmodem protocol). For details on doing this, see Updating The Web Pages

The folders contain the source code for the web pages. To compile the source files, use the Modtronix Network Bootloader application. Each folder contains a *.mxweb file which is used by the Modtronix Network Bootloader to determine which file to included in the created web pages.
